Customer Campaign Design: Instance Record
column4: Description

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The type or category of customer campaign (e.g. cross-sell, up-sell, retention)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: A description of the campaign that clarifies the intended context/use of the campaign, the mechanisms employed and the intended/anticipated response/impact

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Metrics that are defined to assess the target and actual impact of the campaign

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: A description of the metric, defining how it is to be measured in deployment

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: A description of the target performance for the metric that can be defined for different usage scenarios as appropriate

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The precise make-up of the campaign. Note that all customer campaign specifications are subject to versioning as the campaign is refined over time.

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Details how the campaign aligns with selected products and services, including pricing considerations

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The type or category of product or service included in the campaign (e.g. current account)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: A description of how the product or service is adapted in the context of the campaign (e.g. discounted pricing/preferential rates, waived service fees, gifts or incentives)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Describes how any discounted costs are to be accounted for by the product fulfillment function (e.g. borne by fulfillment business unit, compensated by campaign budget)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Guidelines for the execution of the campaign

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Defines the eligibility criteria that are to be applied to select suitable candidates for the customer campaign. (Note candidate lists are developed by Campaign Execution)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Defines any qualifications or credentials required of the bank unit or employees to execute the campaign (e.g. product certified, sign-off authority level)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Provides the structured narrative and any pricing/negotiating frameworks that are used in the execution of the campaign

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Design specification of any consumables that are to be used in the execution of the campaign (e.g. brochures)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The type of consumable item associated with the campaign (e.g. gift, brochure)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The specification of the consumable item in whatever form appropriate. Note sourcing/procurement of the item is handled by execution)

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Maintains a record of the use and impact of customer campaign versions over the life of the campaign

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Reference to the customer campaign execution event

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Reference to the business unit responsible for the campaign execution

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: Details of the deployment set-up/configuration of the campaign for reference

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The customer campaign version number used in the event

Customer Campaign Design: CR Customer Campaign Specification Instance Record
column4: The result/impact of the overall customer campaign event (that can include multiple identified leads/opportunities)
